name: Cold Purgatory
description:
You Are Dead....

It Seems Your In Some Sort Of Snow Covered Purgatory

You Need To Find A Way To Pass On To The Other Side

But Will It Be....

Heaven?

Explore Your Surroundings 

But Avoid The Entity If He Gets You The Game Will Restart

 As Well As Avoid Falling Into The Void If That Happens Press Space To Restart Your Game.

(the Game Will Close On Its Own Once You Complete The Game)

Use Arrow Or WASD Keys To Move
